explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a model for cryptocurrency trend prediction, which is a machine learning application.
explanations.deep learning: The proposed model combines CNN and LSTM, which are deep learning architectures.
explanations.neural network: The model is based on neural networks, specifically CNN and LSTM.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The model uses CNN to process the data.
explanations.CNN: Abbreviation for convolutional neural network, which is part of the proposed model.
explanations.recurrent neural network: LSTM is a type of recurrent neural network used in the model.
explanations.long short-term memory: The model uses LSTM to handle sequential data.
explanations.LSTM: Abbreviation for long short-term memory, which is part of the proposed model.
explanations.attention mechanism: The model incorporates an attention mechanism to optimize effects by exploiting correlations across frequencies and currencies.
